# LaTeX #
#########
*.aux
*.glo
*.idx
*.toc
*.ist
*.acn
*.acr
*.alg
*.bbl
*.blg
*.dvi
*.glg
*.gls
*.ilg
*.ind
*.lof
*.lot
*.maf
*.mtc
*.mtc1
*.out

# Compiled source #
###################
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.o
*.so
*.run*
*.mex*

# Packages #
############
# it's better to unpack these files and commit the raw source
# git has its own built in compression methods
*.7z
*.dmg
*.gz
*.iso
*.jar
*.rar
*.tar
*.zip

# Logs and databases #
######################
*.sql
*.sqlite

# OS generated files #
######################
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
Icon?
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Python #
##########
*.py[cod]

# Distutil #
############
dist
build
*.egg-info

# Emacs #
#########
*~
[#]*[#]
.\#*

# Dolphin #
###########
.directory
